mobileResponsive.description: LB Websites are fully mobile responsive, delivering flawless performance and accessibility on all screen sizes.

mobileResponsive.subtitle: Today's users browse from phones, tablets, and laptops. We build every website to adapt to any screen, giving your visitors a flawless experience wherever they are.

cookiesInfo.title: Cookies Information
cookiesInfo.description: Learn about how we use cookies and manage your preferences.
cookiesInfo.heading: Cookies Information
cookiesInfo.subtitle: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and provide personalized content.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.desc: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us improve your experience.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.desc: Required for basic site functionality and security.

preference.title: Preference Cookies
preference.desc: Remember your language and layout preferences.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.desc: Help us understand how users interact with our website.

management.title: Managing Cookies
management.desc: You can manage or withdraw your cookie consent anytime using our cookie banner or your browser settings.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy & Cookie Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Learn how LB Websites handles your data and cookie preferences in compliance with GDPR regulations.
privacyPolicy.intro: At LB Websites, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data—especially in relation to cookie usage and GDPR compliance.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.desc: Cookies are small text files stored on your device. They help us improve your experience by remembering preferences and providing usage analytics.

essential.title: Essential Cookies:
essential.desc: Required for basic site functionality and authentication.

preference.title: Preference Cookies:
preference.desc: Remember your language and layout preferences.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies:
analytics.desc: Help us understand how users interact with our website (Google Analytics, if accepted).

manageCookies.title: How You Can Manage Cookies
manageCookies.desc: You can manage or withdraw your cookie consent anytime using our cookie banner or your browser settings. Refusing cookies may limit some functionality.

community.title: Community

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our services.
faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our services and website development process.

pricing.question: How much does a website cost?
pricing.answer: Our pricing starts from €299 for basic websites and goes up based on your specific needs. We offer three main plans: Beginner, Advanced, and Business.

timeline.question: How long does it take to build a website?
timeline.answer: Typically, websites take 2-6 weeks depending on complexity. We'll provide a specific timeline during our initial consultation.

cms.question: Can I update my website content myself?
cms.answer: Yes! We provide a user-friendly Content Management System (CMS) that allows you to easily update text, images, and other content without any technical knowledge.

hosting.question: Do you provide hosting and domain services?
hosting.answer: Yes, we handle all hosting and domain setup. We use reliable, fast hosting providers and can register domains for you or work with your existing domain.

support.question: What kind of support do you provide?
support.answer: We provide ongoing support including updates, maintenance, and technical assistance. Support duration varies by plan, from 1 month to 6 months.

seo.question: Do you include SEO optimization?
seo.answer: Yes, all our websites include basic SEO optimization. We also offer advanced SEO services for better search engine rankings.

payment.content: Payment is required upfront for all services. We accept major credit cards and bank transfers.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: Upon full payment, you own the rights to your website design and content, excluding third-party components.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.
